\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
E \\
\& {A \times _BN} \& N \\
\& A \& B
\arrow["g", curve={height=-12pt}, from=1-1, to=2-3]
\arrow["\psi", dashed, from=2-2, to=1-1]
\arrow["{\varphi }"', dashed, from=2-2, to=2-3]
\arrow[dashed, from=2-2, to=3-2]
\arrow[from=2-3, to=3-3]
\arrow[two heads, from=3-2, to=3-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
